item.title: Two people aged 90 die in north London house fire
item.description: A man and woman were found in a burning house in Barnet, north London in the early hours of Friday.

item.title: China and Canada announce tariffs relief after a high-stakes meeting between Carney and Xi
item.description: Canola oil and electric cars are at the centre of the deal agreed by Mark Carney and Xi Jinping after years of strained ties.

item.title: Weight loss jabs are 'opportunity' for Leon, boss says
item.description: John Vincent says the chain could benefit from the weight loss trend, and sets out his plans to revive the business.

item.title: Julio Iglesias denies sexual assault allegations
item.description: In a statement, the Spanish singer says the allegations are "absolutely false and deeply sadden me".

item.title: 'Cautiously optimistic' or 'no progress'? - players divided on Slam demands
item.description: As players demand greater reward from the Grand Slams, some are optimistic about progress. Others are not so sure.
